newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-QBE sees 15-20 pct 96/97 profit growth.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-QBE sees 15-20 pct 96/97 profit growth.

text.p: QBE Insurance Ltd said on Tuesday it expected profit growth in the year to June 30, 1997 of between 15 and 20 percent, with growth possibly in the high teens.

"As I said earlier this year, when we released our results (we saw) somewhere between 10 and 20 percent (profit growth). I'm confident that it will be in the teens, and with a bit of luck it will probably be in the high teens," QBE managing director John Cloney told reporters.
He also said he saw a continuation of the trend of previous years of increased dividends.

QBE said earlier on Tuesday net profit was A$28.5 million, slightly up on the same period last year, for the September quarter and that it expects further profit growth in the 1996/97 financial year. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
